definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: It also has the first class stadium and some gymnasiums .
sentences.chinese: 擁有國家一類體育場館和數家體育健身場所。

sentences.english: What percentage of energy used during the Olympics will come from renewable sources?
sentences.chinese: 翻新使用的場館在奧運的全部場館中佔多大比例？

sentences.english: What percentage of energy used during the Olympics will come from renewable sources?
sentences.chinese: 翻新使用的場館在奧運的全部場館中佔多大比例？

sentences.english: More than 80 percent of the facilities will be built around the Fourth Ring Road .
sentences.chinese: 以上的場館建在被稱做“申奧大道”的四環路周圍。

sentences.english: Reservations for courts and fields should be made in advance (312-742-7650).
sentences.chinese: 預定球場和場館需提前。

sentences.english: The electronic scoreboard is essential for stadiums and gymnasiums.
sentences.chinese: 電子計分牌是體育場館中不可缺少的重要設備。

sentences.english: The roof surface becomes a 5th façade giving the pavillion a different appearance on all sides.
sentences.chinese: 屋頂表面變成第五空間，給場館一個不一樣的外觀。

sentences.english: Moreover, of the amount spent on the sports venues, the government shoulders only about one-half.
sentences.chinese: 而且，政府只承擔了二分之一的體育場館建設費用。

sentences.english: London 2012 will be a mixture of old and new.
sentences.chinese: 2012年倫敦奧運會將會是新舊場館混合使用。

sentences.english: You mean the new Wukesong Culture and Sports Center next to the 4th Ring Road?
sentences.chinese: 你是說四環邊兒上五棵松文化體育中心的新建場館嗎？

sentences.english: Indoor “Rock Gyms” are popular in the metroplex for staying in shape.
sentences.chinese: 用於保持體形的室內“攀巖場館”在大城市非常流行。

sentences.english: The United African Pavilion is the largest pavilion at the Shanghai World Expo.
sentences.chinese: 非洲聯合國家館是上海世博會上最大的場館。

sentences.english: We stand in line at various venues under sun.
sentences.chinese: 我們頂着烈日，到了各個場館排隊。

sentences.english: It's the best choose that fill a prescription of each type of facility.
sentences.chinese: 是糖酒會調劑各種類型場館的最佳選擇。

sentences.english: Court 2 tickets holders can also enter the other courts except for Center Court.
sentences.chinese: 持2號館觀衆可以進入除中央場館外的其它場館觀賽。

sentences.english: Court 2 tickets holders can also enter the other courts except for Center Court.
sentences.chinese: 持2號館觀衆可以進入除中央場館外的其它場館觀賽。

definition: shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
building (a relatively large, multi-storey one)/CL:幢[zhuang4],座[zuo4]
site developed for a group of related enterprises/(industrial or technology) park
conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
